EmailTemplate.name: Event Waitlisted_Vol
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Preferred_First_Name__c},
Thank you so much for registering your interest to attend {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c}.
We've been overwhelmed with expressions of interest for this event from generous volunteers just like you and at this stage, we unfortunately don't have any places available.
However, we will keep you on the waitlist and if any volunteers are no longer able to attend, we'll be sure to notify you as soon as possible.
We hope to see you on one of our fun-filled resilience building programs soon!
Kind Regards,
{!Campaign.Campaign_Owner_Name__c}
